comment_body: Very sorry if it's messy, it's my first attempt at a story of my own and I rushed to get it done in the 15 minutes before my next class, would love some constructive criticism and I hope you atleast find some small measure of enjoyment from this.
It's about 3:30 in the morning here and me and my roommate just read this and almost pissed our pants! Very well written my guy, you deserve my free award.
This is great, especially for something written in 15 minutes. There are just a few small grammatical errors. Other than that, I wouldn't really change anything about it.

Thank you so much, was expecting to get alot of shit so this is a nice surprise.  
Hope you have a nice day!
Thank you, english is only my secondary language so I expected to have made some grammatical errors. If you want to I'd be happy to know where I made those errors so I can improve!
Sure thing! I sent you a PM with all of the changes that I recommend making.
